Colors

Color Name: Light Gray

Color Name: Red

Color Class: Success

Color Name: Eucalyptus

Sizing

Implement the dimensions of components using these increments.
For margins & padding, when in doubt use the "base" size and see if it looks appropriate.

xl Size: 60px

lg Size: 45px

base Size: 30px

md Size: 20px

sm Size: 10px

xs Size: 5px

Breakpoints

Use these to construct media queries for the various device size ranges we target, e.g

.my-component {
  @media @phone { ... }
}

@phone

Phone Breakpoint
screen < @phone-max-width
(699px)

@tablet

Tablet Breakpoint
screen < @tablet-max-width
(1024px)

@desktop

Desktop Breakpoint
screen > @tablet-max-width
(1024px)

@widescreen

Widescreen Breakpoint
screen > @widescreen-min-width
(1460px)

Forms

.post-list - Post Index List

Collapses from 3 columns to 2 columns on @tablet breakpoint.
Collapses from 2 columns to 1 column on @phone breakpoint.

Helper Classes

Use these when toggling styles in JavaScript or needing a single customization to an existing class, e.g 

<img src="icon.svg" /><h3 class="inline-block">Inline Header</h3>

.overflow-hidden

overflow: hidden;

Convenience class used by JS when animating full screen components.

.hidden

display: none;

Convenience class used by JS when hiding and showing components.

.inline-block

display: inline-block;

Convenience class used when showing a typically block element as inline.

Other Tags

<pre> & <code>

Lorem ipsum dummy code sit amet:

for (let i of items) {
  console.log('do a thing');
}

Dotted Paginator

This component has a serious bug (visible here) due to how it renders the portion of the line preceding the dot. Until this can be reimplemented this bug is being worked around in the places where it's used.

This is a video constraining container.
